Title: Relates to financial technology products and services; establishes a regulatory sandbox program
Summary: Relates to financial technology products and services; establishes a regulatory sandbox program.
LawCode: Add Art 8 §§801 - 812, Fin Serv L; add §9-y, Bank L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the financial services law, in relation to creating a regulatory sandbox program; to amend the banking law, in relation to safeguarding financial technology products and services and prohibiting licensing fees for such products and services; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
